name: Dear Riley
description:
"I miss you... It is you, right?"

It's painful to come home to an empty apartment when there used to be someone waiting for you at the end of the day. It's even more painful to know that that person gone forever. But when unusual gifts start appearing at your doorstep, it may be time to question whether or not they ever truly left.

Investigate these packages and read your journal entries to try and make sense of what's happening in the wake of tragedy.

Made in 48 hours for CPP Halloween Horror Jam 2021: Gift

A game by Hikari Oishi and Heather Wright
